knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
````
$C_t = p N_0 - p K_t$

````
#N_0 is the initial population
N_0 = 1000
#p is the proportion of the population that is consumed
p = 0.1

N_t <- vector()
N_t[1] <- N_0
C_t <- vector()
K_t <- vector()
K_t[1] <- 0

for(t in 1:25) {
 C_t[t] <- p * N_t[t]
 K_t[t+1] <- K_t[t] + C_t[t]
    N_t[t+1] <- N_t[t]- C_t[t]
}

plot(C_t~K_t[1:25], ylim =c(0,N_0*p), xlim = c(0, N_0), yaxs = "i", type = "p", col = "blue", xlab = "Kt", ylab = "Ct")
lin_est <- lm(C_t~K_t[1:25])
abline(coef(lin_est), col = "red", lwd = 2, lty = 2)
````
